title: Release v1.0.0
items: Fixed rare nullpointer while handling nutritious gas

title: Release v1.0.0
items: Gathers flowers from bushes at Het's Oasis
Supports all 4 bush types: Rose, Iris, Hydrangea, Hollyhock
Tracks many stats: xp, levels gained, flowers collected, etc. Totals and per/hr.
